checks.description: The firewall has an outbound rule with open access
checks.impact: The port is exposed for ingress from the internet
checks.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range

checks.description: The firewall has an inbound rule with open access
checks.impact: Your port is exposed to the internet
checks.resolution: Set a more restrictive CIRDR range

checks.description: SSH Keys are the preferred way to connect to your droplet, no keys are supplied
checks.impact: Logging in with username and password is easier to compromise
checks.resolution: Use ssh keys for login

checks.description: The load balancer forwarding rule is using an insecure protocol as an entrypoint
checks.impact: Your inbound traffic is not protected
checks.resolution: Switch to HTTPS to benefit from TLS security features

checks.description: Spaces bucket or bucket object has public read acl set
checks.impact: The contents of the space can be accessed publicly
checks.resolution: Apply a more restrictive ACL

checks.description: Force destroy is enabled on Spaces bucket which is dangerous
checks.impact: Accidental deletion of bucket objects
checks.resolution: Don't use force destroy on bucket configuration

checks.description: Spaces buckets should have versioning enabled
checks.impact: Deleted or modified data would not be recoverable
checks.resolution: Enable versioning to protect against accidental or malicious removal or modification

checks.description: Potentially sensitive data stored in block attribute.
checks.impact: Block attribute could be leaking secrets
checks.resolution: Don't include sensitive data in blocks

checks.description: The attribute has potentially sensitive data, passwords, tokens or keys in it
checks.impact: Sensitive credentials may be compromised
checks.resolution: Check the code for vulnerabilities and move to variables

checks.description: Potentially sensitive data stored in local value.
checks.impact: Local value could be leaking secrets
checks.resolution: Don't include sensitive data in locals

checks.description: Potentially sensitive data stored in "default" value of variable.
checks.impact: Default values could be exposing sensitive data
checks.resolution: Don't include sensitive data in variable defaults

checks.description: Github repository shouldn't be public.
checks.impact: Anyone can read the contents of the GitHub repository and leak IP
checks.resolution: Make sensitive or commercially important repositories private

checks.description: Require signed commits should be enabled.
checks.impact: You cannot guarantee the source of unsigned commits.
checks.resolution: Require signed commits for all protected branches.

checks.description: Github vulnerability alerts should be enabled.
checks.impact: Insecure vulnerabilities might be used in the codebase.
checks.resolution: Enable vulnerability alerts for all repositories.

checks.description: Public egress should not be allowed via network policies
checks.impact: Exfiltration of data to the public internet
checks.resolution: Remove public access except where explicitly required

checks.description: Public ingress should not be allowed via network policies
checks.impact: Exposure of infrastructure to the public internet
checks.resolution: Remove public access except where explicitly required

checks.description: Compute instance requests an IP reservation from a public pool
checks.impact: The compute instance has the ability to be reached from outside
checks.resolution: Reconsider the use of an public IP

checks.description: No sensitive data stored in user_data
checks.impact: Sensitive credentials in the user data can be leaked
checks.resolution: Don't use sensitive data in the user data section

checks.description: Web App has registration with AD enabled
checks.impact: Interaction between services can't easily be achieved without username/password
checks.resolution: Register the app identity with AD

checks.description: App Service authentication is activated
checks.impact: Anonymous HTTP requests will be accepted
checks.resolution: Enable authentication to prevent anonymous request being accepted

checks.description: App service disables detailed error messages
checks.impact: Missing crucial details in the error messages
checks.resolution: Enable detailed_error_messages_enabled

checks.description: Azure App Service Web app does not use the latest .Net Core version
checks.impact: Outdated .NET could contain open vulnerabilities
checks.resolution: Use the latest version of the .NET framework

checks.description: Web App uses the latest HTTP version
checks.impact: Outdated versions of HTTP has security vulnerabilities
checks.resolution: Use the latest version of HTTP

checks.description: Ensure App Service can only be accessed via HTTPS. The default is false
checks.impact: Anyone can access App Service using HTTP.
checks.resolution: Enable HTTPS only

checks.description: App service does not enable failed request tracing
checks.impact: Logging of failed request tracing will not be logged
checks.resolution: Enable failed_request_tracing_enabled

checks.description: Ensure FTP Deployments are disabled
checks.impact: FTP is insecure and can lead to loss of data
checks.resolution: Disable FTP

checks.description: App service does not enable HTTP logging
checks.impact: Missed logs related to HTTP requests
checks.resolution: Enable http_logs

checks.description: Azure App Service Web app does not use the latest PHP version
checks.impact: Old PHP Versions can contain vulnerabilities which lead to compromised Web Applications
checks.resolution: Ensure Latest PHP Version is being used

checks.description: Azure App Service Web app does not use the latest Python version
checks.impact: Old Python Versions can contain vulnerabilities which lead to compromised Web Applications
checks.resolution: Ensure Latest Python Version is being used

checks.description: Web App accepts incoming client certificate
checks.impact: Mutual TLS is not being used
checks.resolution: Enable incoming certificates for clients

checks.description: Web App uses latest TLS version
checks.impact: The minimum TLS version for apps should be TLS1_2
checks.resolution: The TLS version being outdated and has known vulnerabilities

checks.description: Roles limited to the required actions
checks.impact: Open permissions for subscriptions could result in an easily compromisable account
checks.resolution: Use targeted permissions for roles

checks.description: Password authentication should be disabled on Azure virtual machines
checks.impact: Using password authentication is less secure that ssh keys may result in compromised servers
checks.resolution: Use ssh authentication for virtual machines

checks.description: Enable disk encryption on managed disk
checks.impact: Data could be read if compromised
checks.resolution: Enable encryption on managed disks

checks.description: Ensure that no sensitive credentials are exposed in VM custom_data
checks.impact: Sensitive credentials in custom_data can be leaked
checks.resolution: Don't use sensitive credentials in the VM custom_data

checks.description: Password authentication in use instead of SSH keys.
checks.impact: Passwords are potentially easier to compromise than SSH Keys
checks.resolution: Use SSH keys for authentication

checks.description: Ensure AKS cluster has Network Policy configured
checks.impact: No network policy is protecting the AKS cluster
checks.resolution: Configure a network policy

checks.description: Ensure AKS has an API Server Authorized IP Ranges enabled
checks.impact: Any IP can interact with the API server
checks.resolution: Limit the access to the API server to a limited IP range

checks.description: Ensure AKS logging to Azure Monitoring is Configured
checks.impact: Logging provides valuable information about access and usage
checks.resolution: Enable logging for AKS

checks.description: Ensure RBAC is enabled on AKS clusters
checks.impact: No role based access control is in place for the AKS cluster
checks.resolution: Enable RBAC

checks.description: Auditing should be enabled on Azure SQL Databases
checks.impact: Auditing provides valuable information about access and usage
checks.resolution: Enable auditing on Azure SQL databases

checks.description: SSL should be enforced on database connections where applicable
checks.impact: Insecure connections could lead to data loss and other vulnerabilities
checks.resolution: Enable SSL enforcement

checks.description: Ensure databases are not publicly accessible
checks.impact: Threat detection helps prevent compromise by alerting on threat detections
checks.resolution: Enable threat detection on Mysql database

checks.description: Ensure databases are not publicly accessible
checks.impact: Publicly accessible database could lead to compromised data
checks.resolution: Disable public access to database when not required

checks.description: Ensure database firewalls do not permit public access
checks.impact: Publicly accessible databases could lead to compromised data
checks.resolution: Don't use wide ip ranges for the sql firewall

checks.description: Ensure server parameter 'log_checkpoints' is set to 'ON' for PostgreSQL Database Server
checks.impact: No error and query logs generated on checkpoint
checks.resolution: Enable checkpoint logging

checks.description: Ensure server parameter 'connection_throttling' is set to 'ON' for PostgreSQL Database Server
checks.impact: No log information to help diagnosing connection contention issues
checks.resolution: Enable connection throttling logging

checks.description: Ensure server parameter 'log_connections' is set to 'ON' for PostgreSQL Database Server
checks.impact: No visibility of successful connections
checks.resolution: Enable connection logging

checks.description: Database auditing rentention period should be longer than 90 days
checks.impact: Short logging retention could result in missing valuable historical information
checks.resolution: Set retention periods of database auditing to greater than 90 days

checks.description: Databases should have the minimum TLS set for connections
checks.impact: Outdated TLS policies increase exposure to known issues
checks.resolution: Use the most modern TLS policies available

checks.description: Data Factory should have public access disabled, the default is enabled.
checks.impact: Data factory is publicly accessible
checks.resolution: Set public access to disabled for Data Factory

checks.description: Unencrypted data lake storage.
checks.impact: Data could be read if compromised
checks.resolution: Enable encryption of data lake storage

checks.description: Function App authentication is activated
checks.impact: Anonymous HTTP requests will be accepted
checks.resolution: Enable authentication to prevent anonymous request being accepted

checks.description: Web App uses the latest HTTP version
checks.impact: Outdated versions of HTTP has security vulnerabilities
checks.resolution: Use the latest version of HTTP

checks.description: Key vault Secret should have a content type set
checks.impact: The secret's type is unclear without a content type
checks.resolution: Provide content type for secrets to aid interpretation on retrieval

checks.description: Ensure that the expiration date is set on all keys
checks.impact: Long life keys increase the attack surface when compromised
checks.resolution: Set an expiration date on the vault key

checks.description: Key Vault Secret should have an expiration date set
checks.impact: Long life secrets increase the opportunity for compromise
checks.resolution: Set an expiry for secrets

checks.description: Key vault should have purge protection enabled
checks.impact: Keys could be purged from the vault without protection
checks.resolution: Enable purge protection for key vaults

checks.description: Key vault should have the network acl block specified
checks.impact: Without a network ACL the key vault is freely accessible
checks.resolution: Set a network ACL for the key vault

checks.description: Ensure the activity retention log is set to at least a year
checks.impact: Short life activity logs can lead to missing records when investigating a breach
checks.resolution: Set a retention period that will allow for delayed investigation

checks.description: Ensure log profile captures all activities
checks.impact: Log profile must capture all activity to be able to ensure that all relevant information possible is available for an investigation
checks.resolution: Configure log profile to capture all activities

checks.description: Ensure activitys are captured for all locations
checks.impact: Activity may be occurring in locations that aren't being monitored
checks.resolution: Enable capture for all locations

checks.description: No threat detections are set
checks.impact: Disabling threat alerts means you are not getting the full benefit of server security protection
checks.resolution: Use all provided threat alerts

checks.description: At least one email address is set for threat alerts
checks.impact: Nobody will be prompty alerted in the case of a threat being detected
checks.resolution: Provide at least one email address for threat alerts

checks.description: Security threat alerts go to subcription owners and co-administrators
checks.impact: Administrators and subscription owners may have a delayed response
checks.resolution: Enable email to subscription owners

checks.description: RDP access should not be accessible from the Internet, should be blocked on port 3389
checks.impact: Anyone from the internet can potentially RDP onto an instance
checks.resolution: Block RDP port from internet

checks.description: An outbound network security rule allows traffic to /0.
checks.impact: The port is exposed for egress to the internet
checks.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range

checks.description: An inbound network security rule allows traffic from /0.
checks.impact: The port is exposed for ingress from the internet
checks.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range

checks.description: Retention policy for flow logs should be enabled and set to greater than 90 days
checks.impact: Not enabling retention or having short expiry on flow logs could lead to compromise being undetected limiting time for analysis
checks.resolution: Ensure flow log retention is turned on with an expiry of >90 days

checks.description: SSH access should not be accessible from the Internet, should be blocked on port 22
checks.impact: Its dangerous to allow SSH access from the internet
checks.resolution: Block port 22 access from the internet

checks.description: Send notification emails for high severity alerts
checks.impact: The ability to react to high severity notifications could be delayed
checks.resolution: Set alert notifications to be on

checks.description: Ensure Azure Defender is set to On for container registries
checks.impact: Azure Defender for App Service detects attacks targeting applications running over App Service.
checks.resolution: Enable AppServices in Azure Defender

checks.description: Ensure Azure Defender is set to On for container registries
checks.impact: Not enabling defender for container registries could lead to compromised account
checks.resolution: Enable ContainerRegistry in Azure Defender

checks.description: Ensure Azure Defender is set to On for key vaults
checks.impact: Azure Defender detects unusual and potentially harmful attempts to access or exploit Key Vault accounts.
checks.resolution: Enable KeyVaults in Azure Defender

checks.description: Ensure Azure Defender is set to On for Kubernetes
checks.impact: Not enabling defender for container registries could lead to compromised account
checks.resolution: Enable KubernetesService in Azure Defender

checks.description: Ensure Azure Defender is set to On for Servers
checks.impact: Azure Defender for servers adds threat detection and advanced defenses for Windows and Linux machines.
checks.resolution: Enable VirtualMachines in Azure Defender

checks.description: Ensure Azure Defender is set to On for SQL Servers
checks.impact: Azure Defender for SQL servers on machines extends the protections for your Azure-native SQL Servers to fully support hybrid environments and protect SQL servers (all supported version) hosted in Azure
checks.resolution: Enable SqlServers in Azure Defender

checks.description: Ensure Azure Defender is set to On for Sql Server on Machines
checks.impact: Azure Defender for SQL servers on machines extends the protections for your Azure-native SQL Servers to fully support hybrid environments and protect SQL servers (all supported version) hosted in Azure.
checks.resolution: Enable ContainerRegistry in Azure Defender

checks.description: Ensure Azure Defender is set to On for storage accounts
checks.impact: Azure Defender for Storage detects unusual and potentially harmful attempts to access or exploit storage accounts.
checks.resolution: Enable StorageAccounts in Azure Defender

checks.description: Enable the standard security center subscription tier
checks.impact: Using free subscription does not enable Azure Defender for the resource type
checks.resolution: Enable standard subscription tier to benefit from Azure Defender

checks.description: The required contact details should be set for security center
checks.impact: Without a telephone number set, Azure support can't contact
checks.resolution: Set a telephone number for security center contact

checks.description: Trusted Microsoft Services should have bypass access to Storage accounts
checks.impact: Trusted Microsoft Services won't be able to access storage account unless rules set to allow
checks.resolution: Allow Trusted Microsoft Services to bypass

checks.description: Ensure public access level for Blob Containers is set to private
checks.impact: Data in the storage container could be exposed publicly
checks.resolution: Disable public access to storage containers

checks.description: The default action on Storage account network rules should be set to deny
checks.impact: Network rules that allow could cause data to be exposed publicly
checks.resolution: Set network rules to deny

checks.description: Storage accounts should be configured to only accept transfers that are over secure connections
checks.impact: Insecure transfer of data into secure accounts could be read if intercepted
checks.resolution: Only allow secure connection for transferring data into storage accounts

checks.description: Storage containers in blob storage mode should not have public access
checks.impact: Data in the storage container could be exposed publicly
checks.resolution: Disable public access to storage containers

checks.description: When using Queue Services for a storage account, logging should be enabled.
checks.impact: Logging provides valuable information about access and usage
checks.resolution: Enable logging for Queue Services

checks.description: The minimum TLS version for Storage Accounts should be TLS1_2
checks.impact: The TLS version being outdated and has known vulnerabilities
checks.resolution: Use a more recent TLS/SSL policy for the load balancer

checks.description: Synapse Workspace should have managed virtual network enabled, the default is disabled.
checks.impact: Your Synapse workspace is not using the private endpoints
checks.resolution: Set manage virtual network to enabled

checks.description: BigQuery datasets should only be accessible within the organisation
checks.impact: Exposure of sensitive data to the public iniernet
checks.resolution: Configure access permissions with higher granularity

checks.description: Disks should be encrypted with Customer Supplied Encryption Keys
checks.impact: Using unmanaged keys does not allow for proper management
checks.resolution: Use managed keys

checks.description: Encrypted compute disk with unmanaged keys.
checks.impact: Encryption of disk using unmanaged keys.
checks.resolution: Enable encryption using a customer-managed key.

checks.description: The encryption key used to encrypt a compute disk has been specified in plaintext.
checks.impact: The encryption key should be considered compromised as it is not stored securely.
checks.resolution: Reference a managed key rather than include the key in raw format.

checks.description: Instances should have Shielded VM enabled
checks.impact: Unable to detect rootkits
checks.resolution: Enable Shielded VM

checks.description: VPC flow logs should be enabled for all subnets
checks.impact: Limited auditing capability and awareness
checks.resolution: Enable VPC flow logs

checks.description: Instances should not use the default service account
checks.impact: Instance has full access to the project
checks.resolution: Remove use of default service account

checks.description: Instances should not have IP forwarding enabled
checks.impact: Instance can send/receive packets without the explicit instance address
checks.resolution: Disable IP forwarding

checks.description: Instances should not override the project setting for OS Login
checks.impact: Access via SSH key cannot be revoked automatically when an IAM user is removed.
checks.resolution: Enable OS Login at project level and remove instance-level overrides

checks.description: Disk encryption keys should not be provided in plaintext
checks.impact: Compromise of encryption keys
checks.resolution: Use managed keys or provide the raw key via a secrets manager

checks.description: VM disk encryption keys should not be provided in plaintext
checks.impact: Compromise of encryption keys
checks.resolution: Use managed keys or provide the raw key via a secrets manager

checks.description: Disable project-wide SSH keys for all instances
checks.impact: Compromise of a single key pair compromises all instances
checks.resolution: Disable project-wide SSH keys

checks.description: An outbound firewall rule allows traffic to /0.
checks.impact: The port is exposed for egress to the internet
checks.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range

checks.description: An inbound firewall rule allows traffic from /0.
checks.impact: The port is exposed for ingress from the internet
checks.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range

checks.description: Instances should not have public IP addresses
checks.impact: Direct exposure of an instance to the public internet
checks.resolution: Remove public IP

checks.description: Disable serial port connectivity for all instances
checks.impact: Unrestricted network access to the serial console of the instance
checks.resolution: Disable serial port access

checks.description: OS Login should be enabled at project level
checks.impact: Access via SSH key cannot be revoked automatically when an IAM user is removed.
checks.resolution: Enable OS Login at project level

checks.description: SSL policies should enforce secure versions of TLS
checks.impact: Data in transit is not sufficiently secured
checks.resolution: Enforce a minimum TLS version of 1.2

checks.description: VM disks should be encrypted with Customer Supplied Encryption Keys
checks.impact: Using unmanaged keys does not allow for proper management
checks.resolution: Use managed keys

checks.description: Cloud DNS should use DNSSEC
checks.impact: Unverified DNS responses could lead to man-in-the-middle attacks
checks.resolution: Enable DNSSEC

checks.description: Zone signing should not use RSA SHA1
checks.impact: Less secure encryption algorithm than others available
checks.resolution: Use RSA SHA512

checks.description: Kubernetes should have 'Automatic repair' enabled
checks.impact: Failing nodes will require manual repair.
checks.resolution: Enable automatic repair

checks.description: Kubernetes should have 'Automatic upgrade' enabled
checks.impact: Nodes will need the cluster master version manually updating
checks.resolution: Enable automatic upgrades

checks.description: Clusters should have IP aliasing enabled
checks.impact: Nodes need a NAT gateway to access local services
checks.resolution: Enable IP aliasing

checks.description: Master authorized networks should be configured on GKE clusters
checks.impact: Unrestricted network access to the master
checks.resolution: Enable master authorized networks

checks.description: Network Policy should be enabled on GKE clusters
checks.impact: Unrestricted inter-cluster communication
checks.resolution: Enable network policy

checks.description: Clusters should be set to private
checks.impact: Nodes may be exposed to the public internet
checks.resolution: Enable private cluster

checks.description: Stackdriver Logging should be enabled
checks.impact: Visibility will be reduced
checks.resolution: Enable StackDriver logging

checks.description: Stackdriver Monitoring should be enabled
checks.impact: Visibility will be reduced
checks.resolution: Enable StackDriver monitoring

checks.description: Pod security policy enforcement not defined.
checks.impact: Pods could be operating with more permissions than required to be effective
checks.resolution: Use security policies for pods to restrict permissions to those needed to be effective

checks.description: Legacy metadata endpoints enabled.
checks.impact: Legacy metadata endpoints don't require metadata headers
checks.resolution: Disable legacy metadata endpoints

checks.description: Clusters should use client certificates for authentication
checks.impact: Less secure authentication method in use
checks.resolution: Use client certificates for authentication

checks.description: Legacy client authentication methods utilized.
checks.impact: Username and password authentication methods are less secure
checks.resolution: Use service account or OAuth for authentication

checks.description: GKE Control Plane should not be publicly accessible
checks.impact: GKE control plane exposed to public internet
checks.resolution: Use private nodes and master authorised networks to prevent exposure

checks.description: Node metadata value disables metadata concealment.
checks.impact: Metadata that isn't concealed potentially risks leakage of sensitive data
checks.resolution: Set node metadata to SECURE or GKE_METADATA_SERVER

checks.description: Ensure Container-Optimized OS (cos) is used for Kubernetes Engine Clusters Node image
checks.impact: COS is the recommended OS image to use on cluster nodes
checks.resolution: Use the COS image type

checks.description: Shielded GKE nodes not enabled.
checks.impact: Node identity and integrity can't be verified without shielded GKE nodes
checks.resolution: Enable node shielding

checks.description: Clusters should be configured with Labels
checks.impact: Asset management can be limited/more difficult
checks.resolution: Set cluster resource labels

checks.description: Legacy ABAC permissions are enabled.
checks.impact: ABAC permissions are less secure than RBAC permissions
checks.resolution: Switch to using RBAC permissions

checks.description: Checks for service account defined for GKE nodes
checks.impact: Service accounts with wide permissions can increase the risk of compromise
checks.resolution: Use limited permissions for service accounts to be effective

checks.description: Roles should not be assigned to default service accounts
checks.impact: Violation of principal of least privilege
checks.resolution: Use specialised service accounts for specific purposes.

checks.description: Users should not be granted service account access at the folder level
checks.impact: Privilege escalation, impersonation of any/all services
checks.resolution: Provide access at the service-level instead of folder-level, if required

checks.description: Roles should not be assigned to default service accounts
checks.impact: Violation of principal of least privilege
checks.resolution: Use specialised service accounts for specific purposes.

checks.description: Users should not be granted service account access at the organization level
checks.impact: Privilege escalation, impersonation of any/all services
checks.resolution: Provide access at the service-level instead of organization-level, if required

checks.description: Service accounts should not have roles assigned with excessive privileges
checks.impact: Cloud account takeover if a resource using a service account is compromised
checks.resolution: Limit service account access to minimal required set

checks.description: Roles should not be assigned to default service accounts
checks.impact: Violation of principal of least privilege
checks.resolution: Use specialised service accounts for specific purposes.

checks.description: Users should not be granted service account access at the project level
checks.impact: Privilege escalation, impersonation of any/all services
checks.resolution: Provide access at the service-level instead of project-level, if required

checks.description: IAM granted directly to user.
checks.impact: Users shouldn't have permissions granted to them directly
checks.resolution: Roles should be granted permissions and assigned to users

checks.description: KMS keys should be rotated at least every 90 days
checks.impact: Exposure is greater if the same keys are used over a long period
checks.resolution: Set key rotation period to 90 days

checks.description: Default network should not be created at project level
checks.impact: Exposure of internal infrastructure/services to public internet
checks.resolution: Disable automatic default network creation

checks.description: Enable automated backups to recover from data-loss
checks.impact: No recovery of lost or corrupted data
checks.resolution: Enable automated backups

checks.description: Temporary file logging should be enabled for all temporary files.
checks.impact: Use of temporary files will not be logged
checks.resolution: Enable temporary file logging for all files

checks.description: SSL connections to a SQL database instance should be enforced.
checks.impact: Intercepted data can be read in transit
checks.resolution: Enforce SSL for all connections

checks.description: Disable local_infile setting in MySQL
checks.impact: Arbitrary files read by attackers when combined with a SQL injection vulnerability.
checks.resolution: Disable the local infile setting

checks.description: Contained database authentication should be disabled
checks.impact: Access can be granted without knowledge of the database administrator
checks.resolution: Disable contained database authentication

checks.description: Cross-database ownership chaining should be disabled
checks.impact: Unintended access to sensitive data
checks.resolution: Disable cross database ownership chaining

checks.description: Ensure that Cloud SQL Database Instances are not publicly exposed
checks.impact: Public exposure of sensitive data
checks.resolution: Remove public access from database instances

checks.description: Ensure that logging of checkpoints is enabled.
checks.impact: Insufficient diagnostic data.
checks.resolution: Enable checkpoints logging.

checks.description: Ensure that logging of connections is enabled.
checks.impact: Insufficient diagnostic data.
checks.resolution: Enable connection logging.

checks.description: Ensure that logging of disconnections is enabled.
checks.impact: Insufficient diagnostic data.
checks.resolution: Enable disconnection logging.

checks.description: Ensure that Postgres errors are logged
checks.impact: Loss of error logging
checks.resolution: Set the minimum log severity to at least ERROR

checks.description: Ensure that logging of lock waits is enabled.
checks.impact: Issues leading to denial of service may not be identified.
checks.resolution: Enable lock wait logging.

checks.description: Ensure that logging of long statements is disabled.
checks.impact: Sensitive data could be exposed in the database logs.
checks.resolution: Disable minimum duration statement logging completely

checks.description: Ensure that Cloud Storage buckets have uniform bucket-level access enabled
checks.impact: ACLs are difficult to manage and often lead to incorrect/unintended configurations.
checks.resolution: Enable uniform bucket level access to provide a uniform permissioning system.

checks.description: Ensure that Cloud Storage bucket is not anonymously or publicly accessible.
checks.impact: Public exposure of sensitive data.
checks.resolution: Restrict public access to the bucket.

checks.description: No plaintext password for compute instance
checks.impact: Including a plaintext password could lead to compromised instance
checks.resolution: Do not use plaintext passwords in terraform files

checks.description: A firewall rule allows traffic from/to the public internet
checks.impact: Exposure of infrastructure to the public internet
checks.resolution: Employ more restrictive firewall rules

checks.description: API Gateway stages for V1 and V2 should have access logging enabled
checks.impact: Logging provides vital information about access and usage
checks.resolution: Enable logging for API Gateway stages

checks.description: API Gateway must have cache enabled
checks.impact: Data stored in the cache that is unencrypted may be vulnerable to compromise
checks.resolution: Enable cache encryption

checks.description: API Gateway must have X-Ray tracing enabled
checks.impact: WIthout full tracing enabled it is difficult to trace the flow of logs
checks.resolution: Enable tracing

checks.description: No public access to API Gateway methods
checks.impact: API gateway methods can be unauthorized accessed
checks.resolution: Use and authorization method or require API Key

checks.description: API Gateway domain name uses outdated SSL/TLS protocols.
checks.impact: Outdated SSL policies increase exposure to known vulnerabilities
checks.resolution: Use the most modern TLS/SSL policies available

checks.description: Athena databases and workgroup configurations are created unencrypted at rest by default, they should be encrypted
checks.impact: Data can be read if the Athena Database is compromised
checks.resolution: Enable encryption at rest for Athena databases and workgroup configurations

checks.description: Athena workgroups should enforce configuration to prevent client disabling encryption
checks.impact: Clients can ignore encryption requirements
checks.resolution: Enforce the configuration to prevent client overrides

checks.description: Launch configuration with unencrypted block device.
checks.impact: The block device could be compromised and read from
checks.resolution: Turn on encryption for all block devices

checks.description: A resource has a public IP address.
checks.impact: The instance or configuration is publicly accessible
checks.resolution: Set the instance to not be publicly accessible

checks.description: Cloudfront distribution should have Access Logging configured
checks.impact: Logging provides vital information about access and usage
checks.resolution: Enable logging for CloudFront distributions

checks.description: CloudFront distribution does not have a WAF in front.
checks.impact: Complex web application attacks can more easily be performed without a WAF
checks.resolution: Enable WAF for the CloudFront distribution

checks.description: CloudFront distribution allows unencrypted (HTTP) communications.
checks.impact: CloudFront is available through an unencrypted connection
checks.resolution: Only allow HTTPS for CloudFront distribution communication

checks.description: CloudFront distribution uses outdated SSL/TLS protocols.
checks.impact: Outdated SSL policies increase exposure to known vulnerabilities
checks.resolution: Use the most modern TLS/SSL policies available

checks.description: Cloudtrail should be enabled in all regions regardless of where your AWS resources are generally homed
checks.impact: Activity could be happening in your account in a different region
checks.resolution: Enable Cloudtrail in all regions

checks.description: Cloudtrail should be encrypted at rest to secure access to sensitive trail data
checks.impact: Data can be freely read if compromised
checks.resolution: Enable encryption at rest

checks.description: Cloudtrail log validation should be enabled to prevent tampering of log data
checks.impact: Illicit activity could be removed from the logs
checks.resolution: Turn on log validation for Cloudtrail

checks.description: CloudWatch log groups should be encrypted using CMK
checks.impact: Log data may be leaked if the logs are compromised. No auditing of who have viewed the logs.
checks.resolution: Enable CMK encryption of CloudWatch Log Groups

checks.description: CodeBuild Project artifacts encryption should not be disabled
checks.impact: CodeBuild project artifacts are unencrypted
checks.resolution: Enable encryption for CodeBuild project artifacts

checks.description: Config configuration aggregator should be using all regions for source
checks.impact: Sources that aren't covered by the aggregator are not include in the configuration
checks.resolution: Set the aggregator to cover all regions

checks.description: DocumentDB logs export should be enabled
checks.impact: Limited visibility of audit trail for changes to the DocumentDB
checks.resolution: Enable export logs

checks.description: DocumentDB storage must be encrypted
checks.impact: Unencrypted sensitive data is vulnerable to compromise.
checks.resolution: Enable storage encryption

checks.description: DocumentDB encryption should use Customer Managed Keys
checks.impact: Using AWS managed keys does not allow for fine grained control
checks.resolution: Enable encryption using customer managed keys

checks.description: DAX Cluster should always encrypt data at rest
checks.impact: Data can be freely read if compromised
checks.resolution: Enable encryption at rest for DAX Cluster

checks.description: Point in time recovery should be enabled to protect DynamoDB table
checks.impact: Accidental or malicious writes and deletes can't be rolled back
checks.resolution: Enable point in time recovery

checks.description: DynamoDB tables should use at rest encryption with a Customer Managed Key
checks.impact: Using AWS managed keys does not allow for fine grained control
checks.resolution: Enable server side encryption with a customer managed key

checks.description: EBS volumes must be encrypted
checks.impact: Unencrypted sensitive data is vulnerable to compromise.
checks.resolution: Enable encryption of EBS volumes

checks.description: EBS volume encryption should use Customer Managed Keys
checks.impact: Using AWS managed keys does not allow for fine grained control
checks.resolution: Enable encryption using customer managed keys

checks.description: aws_instance should activate session tokens for Instance Metadata Service.
checks.impact: Instance metadata service can be interacted with freely
checks.resolution: Enable HTTP token requirement for IMDS

checks.description: User data for EC2 instances must not contain sensitive AWS keys
checks.impact: User data is visible through the AWS Management console
checks.resolution: Remove sensitive data from the EC2 instance user-data

checks.description: ECR repository has image scans disabled.
checks.impact: The ability to scan images is not being used and vulnerabilities will not be highlighted
checks.resolution: Enable ECR image scanning

checks.description: ECR images tags shouldn't be mutable.
checks.impact: Image tags could be overwritten with compromised images
checks.resolution: Only use immutable images in ECR

checks.description: ECR repository policy must block public access
checks.impact: Risk of potential data leakage of sensitive artifacts
checks.resolution: Do not allow public access in the policy

checks.description: ECR Repository should use customer managed keys to allow more control
checks.impact: Using AWS managed keys does not allow for fine grained control
checks.resolution: Use customer managed keys

checks.description: ECS clusters should have container insights enabled
checks.impact: Not all metrics and logs may be gathered for containers when Container Insights isn't enabled
checks.resolution: Enable Container Insights

checks.description: ECS Task Definitions with EFS volumes should use in-transit encryption
checks.impact: Intercepted traffic to and from EFS may lead to data loss
checks.resolution: Enable in transit encryption when using efs

checks.description: Task definition defines sensitive environment variable(s).
checks.impact: Sensitive data could be exposed in the AWS Management Console
checks.resolution: Use secrets for the task definition

checks.description: EFS Encryption has not been enabled
checks.impact: Data can be read from the EFS if compromised
checks.resolution: Enable encryption for EFS

checks.description: EKS Clusters should have cluster control plane logging turned on
checks.impact: Logging provides valuable information about access and usage
checks.resolution: Enable logging for the EKS control plane

checks.description: EKS should have the encryption of secrets enabled
checks.impact: EKS secrets could be read if compromised
checks.resolution: Enable encryption of EKS secrets

checks.description: EKS Clusters should have the public access disabled
checks.impact: EKS can be access from the internet
checks.resolution: Don't enable public access to EKS Clusters

checks.description: EKS cluster should not have open CIDR range for public access
checks.impact: EKS can be access from the internet
checks.resolution: Don't enable public access to EKS Clusters

checks.description: Domain logging should be enabled for Elastic Search domains
checks.impact: Logging provides vital information about access and usage
checks.resolution: Enable logging for ElasticSearch domains

checks.description: Elasticsearch domain uses plaintext traffic for node to node communication.
checks.impact: In transit data between nodes could be read if intercepted
checks.resolution: Enable encrypted node to node communication

checks.description: AWS ES Domain should have logging enabled
checks.impact: Logging provides vital information about access and usage
checks.resolution: Enable logging for ElasticSearch domains

checks.description: Unencrypted Elasticache Replication Group.
checks.impact: Data in the replication group could be readable if compromised
checks.resolution: Enable encryption for replication group

checks.description: Elasticsearch doesn't enforce HTTPS traffic.
checks.impact: HTTP traffic can be intercepted and the contents read
checks.resolution: Enforce the use of HTTPS for ElasticSearch

checks.description: Elasticsearch domain endpoint is using outdated TLS policy.
checks.impact: Outdated SSL policies increase exposure to known vulnerabilities
checks.resolution: Use the most modern TLS/SSL policies available

checks.description: Elasticsearch domain isn't encrypted at rest.
checks.impact: Data will be readable if compromised
checks.resolution: Enable ElasticSearch domain encryption

checks.description: Missing description for security group/security group rule.
checks.impact: Descriptions provide context for the firewall rule reasons
checks.resolution: Add descriptions for all security groups and rules

checks.description: Redis cluster should have backup retention turned on
checks.impact: Without backups of the redis cluster recovery is made difficult
checks.resolution: Configure snapshot retention for redis cluster

checks.description: Elasticache Replication Group uses unencrypted traffic.
checks.impact: In transit data in the Replication Group could be read if intercepted
checks.resolution: Enable in transit encryption for replication group

checks.description: Load balancers should drop invalid headers
checks.impact: Invalid headers being passed through to the target of the load balance may exploit vulnerabilities
checks.resolution: Set drop_invalid_header_fields to true

checks.description: Load balancer is exposed to the internet.
checks.impact: The load balancer is exposed on the internet
checks.resolution: Switch to an internal load balancer or add a tfsec ignore

checks.description: Use of plain HTTP.
checks.impact: Your traffic is not protected
checks.resolution: Switch to HTTPS to benefit from TLS security features

checks.description: IAM customer managed policies should not allow decryption actions on all KMS keys
checks.impact: Identities may be able to decrypt data which they should not have access to
checks.resolution: Scope down the resources of the IAM policy to specific keys

checks.description: IAM Password policy should prevent password reuse.
checks.impact: Password reuse increase the risk of compromised passwords being abused
checks.resolution: Prevent password reuse in the policy

checks.description: IAM policy should avoid use of wildcards and instead apply the principle of least privilege
checks.impact: Overly permissive policies may grant access to sensitive resources
checks.resolution: Specify the exact permissions required, and to which resources they should apply instead of using wildcards.

checks.description: IAM Password policy should have requirement for at least one lowercase character.
checks.impact: Short, simple passwords are easier to compromise
checks.resolution: Enforce longer, more complex passwords in the policy

checks.description: IAM Password policy should have requirement for at least one number in the password.
checks.impact: Short, simple passwords are easier to compromise
checks.resolution: Enforce longer, more complex passwords in the policy

checks.description: IAM Password policy should have requirement for at least one symbol in the password.
checks.impact: Short, simple passwords are easier to compromise
checks.resolution: Enforce longer, more complex passwords in the policy

checks.description: IAM Password policy should have requirement for at least one uppercase character.
checks.impact: Short, simple passwords are easier to compromise
checks.resolution: Enforce longer, more complex passwords in the policy

checks.description: IAM Password policy should have expiry less than or equal to 90 days.
checks.impact: Long life password increase the likelihood of a password eventually being compromised
checks.resolution: Limit the password duration with an expiry in the policy

checks.description: IAM Password policy should have minimum password length of 14 or more characters.
checks.impact: Short, simple passwords are easier to compromise
checks.resolution: Enforce longer, more complex passwords in the policy

checks.description: Kinesis stream is unencrypted.
checks.impact: Intercepted data can be read in transit
checks.resolution: Enable in transit encryption

checks.description: A KMS key is not configured to auto-rotate.
checks.impact: Long life KMS keys increase the attack surface when compromised
checks.resolution: Configure KMS key to auto rotate

checks.description: Lambda functions should have X-Ray tracing enabled
checks.impact: Without full tracing enabled, it is difficult to trace the flow of logs
checks.resolution: Enable tracing

checks.description: Ensure that lambda function permission has a source arn specified
checks.impact: Not providing the source ARN allows any resource from principal, even from other accounts
checks.resolution: Always provide a source arn for Lambda permissions

checks.description: Ensure all data stored in the Launch configuration EBS is securely encrypted
checks.impact: Sensitive credentials in user data can be leaked
checks.resolution: Don't use sensitive data in user data

checks.description: AWS provider has access credentials specified.
checks.impact: Exposing the credentials in the Terraform provider increases the risk of secret leakage
checks.resolution: Don't include access credentials in plain text

checks.description: MQ Broker should have audit logging enabled
checks.impact: Without audit logging it is difficult to trace activity in the MQ broker
checks.resolution: Enable audit logging

checks.description: MQ Broker should have general logging enabled
checks.impact: Without logging it is difficult to trace issues
checks.resolution: Enable general logging

checks.description: Ensure MQ Broker is not publicly exposed
checks.impact: Publicly accessible MQ Broker may be vulnerable to compromise
checks.resolution: Disable public access when not required

checks.description: A MSK cluster allows unencrypted data in transit.
checks.impact: Intercepted data can be read in transit
checks.resolution: Enable in transit encryption

checks.description: Ensure MSK Cluster logging is enabled
checks.impact: Without logging it is difficult to trace issues
checks.resolution: Enable logging

checks.description: Nepture logs export should be enabled
checks.impact: Limited visibility of audit trail for changes to Neptune
checks.resolution: Enable export logs

checks.description: Neptune storage must be encrypted at rest
checks.impact: Unencrypted sensitive data is vulnerable to compromise.
checks.resolution: Enable encryption of Neptune storage

checks.description: RDS Cluster and RDS instance should have backup retention longer than default 1 day
checks.impact: Potential loss of data and short opportunity for recovery
checks.resolution: Explicitly set the retention period to greater than the default

checks.description: Encryption for RDS Performance Insights should be enabled.
checks.impact: Data can be read from the RDS Performance Insights if it is compromised
checks.resolution: Enable encryption for RDS clusters and instances

checks.description: There is no encryption specified or encryption is disabled on the RDS Cluster.
checks.impact: Data can be read from the RDS cluster if it is compromised
checks.resolution: Enable encryption for RDS clusters

checks.description: RDS encryption has not been enabled at a DB Instance level.
checks.impact: Data can be read from RDS instances if compromised
checks.resolution: Enable encryption for RDS instances

checks.description: AWS Classic resource usage.
checks.impact: Classic resources are running in a shared environment with other customers
checks.resolution: Switch to VPC resources

checks.description: A database resource is marked as publicly accessible.
checks.impact: The database instance is publicly accessible
checks.resolution: Set the database to not be publicly accessible

checks.description: Missing description for security group/security group rule.
checks.impact: Descriptions provide context for the firewall rule reasons
checks.resolution: Add descriptions for all security groups and rules

checks.description: Redshift clusters should use at rest encryption
checks.impact: Data may be leaked if infrastructure is compromised
checks.resolution: Enable encryption using CMK

checks.description: Redshift cluster should be deployed into a specific VPC
checks.impact: Redshift cluster does not benefit from VPC security if it is deployed in EC2 classic mode
checks.resolution: Deploy Redshift cluster into a non default VPC

checks.description: S3 Access block should block public ACL
checks.impact: PUT calls with public ACLs specified can make objects public
checks.resolution: Enable blocking any PUT calls with a public ACL specified

checks.description: S3 Access block should block public policy
checks.impact: Users could put a policy that allows public access
checks.resolution: Prevent policies that allow public access being PUT

checks.description: Unencrypted S3 bucket.
checks.impact: The bucket objects could be read if compromised
checks.resolution: Configure bucket encryption

checks.description: S3 Bucket does not have logging enabled.
checks.impact: There is no way to determine the access to this bucket
checks.resolution: Add a logging block to the resource to enable access logging

checks.description: S3 Data should be versioned
checks.impact: Deleted or modified data would not be recoverable
checks.resolution: Enable versioning to protect against accidental/malicious removal or modification

checks.description: S3 Access Block should Ignore Public Acl
checks.impact: PUT calls with public ACLs specified can make objects public
checks.resolution: Enable ignoring the application of public ACLs in PUT calls

checks.description: S3 Bucket has an ACL defined which allows public access.
checks.impact: The contents of the bucket can be accessed publicly
checks.resolution: Apply a more restrictive bucket ACL

checks.description: S3 Access block should restrict public bucket to limit access
checks.impact: Public buckets can be accessed by anyone
checks.resolution: Limit the access to public buckets to only the owner or AWS Services (eg; CloudFront)

checks.description: S3 buckets should each define an aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block
checks.impact: Public access policies may be applied to sensitive data buckets
checks.resolution: Define a aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block for the given bucket to control public access policies

checks.description: Unencrypted SNS topic.
checks.impact: The SNS topic messages could be read if compromised
checks.resolution: Turn on SNS Topic encryption

checks.description: Unencrypted SQS queue.
checks.impact: The SQS queue messages could be read if compromised
checks.resolution: Turn on SQS Queue encryption

checks.description: AWS SQS policy document has wildcard action statement.
checks.impact: SQS policies with wildcard actions allow more that is required
checks.resolution: Keep policy scope to the minimum that is required to be effective

checks.description: Secrets Manager should use customer managed keys
checks.impact: Using AWS managed keys reduces the flexibility and control over the encryption key
checks.resolution: Use customer managed keys

checks.description: Missing description for security group/security group rule.
checks.impact: Descriptions provide context for the firewall rule reasons
checks.resolution: Add descriptions for all security groups and rules

checks.description: Ensures that usage of security groups with inline rules and security group rule resources are not mixed.
checks.impact: Security group rules will be overwritten and will result in unintended blocking of network traffic
checks.resolution: Either define all of a security group's rules inline, or none of the security group's rules inline

checks.description: AWS best practice to not use the default VPC for workflows
checks.impact: The default VPC does not have critical security features applied
checks.resolution: Create a non-default vpc for resources to be created in

checks.description: An ingress Network ACL rule allows ALL ports.
checks.impact: All ports exposed for egressing data
checks.resolution: Set specific allowed ports

checks.description: An inline egress security group rule allows traffic to /0.
checks.impact: The port is exposed for egressing data to the internet
checks.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range

checks.description: An egress security group rule allows traffic to /0.
checks.impact: Your port is egressing data to the internet
checks.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range

checks.description: An ingress Network ACL rule allows specific ports from /0.
checks.impact: The ports are exposed for ingressing data to the internet
checks.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range

checks.description: An inline ingress security group rule allows traffic from /0.
checks.impact: The port is exposed for ingress from the internet
checks.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range

checks.description: An ingress security group rule allows traffic from /0.
checks.impact: Your port exposed to the internet
checks.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range

checks.description: An outdated SSL policy is in use by a load balancer.
checks.impact: The SSL policy is outdated and has known vulnerabilities
checks.resolution: Use a more recent TLS/SSL policy for the load balancer

checks.description: Root and user volumes on Workspaces should be encrypted
checks.impact: Data can be freely read if compromised
checks.resolution: Root and user volume encryption should be enabled
